markings: Weinstein Hammons Gallery label on back in center
signed: on back, in center in black ink: Two Towels | 2004 | A S
text: Alec Soth is an American photographer renowned for his ability to elevate the everyday, and to find poetry in seemingly mundane circumstances. Nuzzling on the bed of a roadside motel, these towel-swans point to a romantic encounter soon to occur—an event made all the more poignant by the shabbiness of the room itself.
title: Two Towels
